Projects

Cashflow

Spearheaded the Design of a Finance Dashboard App, to Revolutionize the User Experience

CLIENT: CASHFLOW

ROLE: UI/UX DESIGNER

PERIOD: MAR 2022 - DEC 2023

As the UI/UX Designer for the Cashflow project, I spearheaded the design of a finance management dashboard app, aiming to revolutionize the user experience. Through extensive user research, I crafted an intuitive interface that seamlessly blended aesthetics with functionality. Meticulous attention to detail, collaborative iterations, and user testing ensured the final product is a sophisticated and user-friendly tool, setting a new standard for financial management applications. The Cashflow dashboard stands as a testament to the power of thoughtful design in making financial tasks accessible and enjoyable for users.

Finrency

Redefine Convenience and User Engagement

CLIENT: FINRENCY

ROLE: UI/UX DESIGNER

PERIOD: AUG 2021 - JUL 2022

Through meticulous user research, I honed in on the specific needs of our audience, ensuring that every aspect of the app catered to seamless currency transactions. From the intuitive layout to the incorporation of real-time exchange rate features, I aimed to create a mobile app that not only simplifies financial transactions but also provides users with a visually pleasing and efficient platform. Collaborative design iterations and user feedback played a pivotal role in shaping the app into a dynamic and user-friendly tool that aligns with Finrency's vision of transforming currency exchange into a streamlined and enjoyable experience.

WidFit

Offer Users Real-time Insights into Their Fitness Progess at a Glance

CLIENT: WIDFIT

ROLE: UI/UX DESIGNER

PERIOD: SEP 2020 - JUL 2021

My focus revolved around designing an iPhone widget dedicated to tracking fitness activity, aiming to seamlessly integrate health monitoring into users' daily lives. Through in-depth user research, I pinpointed the essential metrics and created a visually appealing yet minimalist design for the widget. The goal was to offer users real-time insights into their fitness progress at a glance. Collaborative design iterations ensured that the WidFit widget not only met but exceeded expectations, providing an intuitive and engaging tool for users to effortlessly track and stay motivated on their fitness journeys.

Built using Framer
